com.here.android.mpa.ar

Class ARPoseReading

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.ar.ARPoseReading

  • public final class ARPoseReading
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a model class comprising the latitude, longitude, altitude, pitch, heading, roll and time stamp for the current AR pose. This object can be retrieved by calling ARController.getPose().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj) 
      float getAltitude()
      Get the altitude in meters as height above the WGS84 ellipsoid.

      Get the latitude in WGS84 degrees.

      Get the longitude in WGS84 degrees.
      float getPitch()
      Get the x-axis rotation (pitch) in radians.
      float getRoll()
      Get the z-axis rotation (roll) in radians.
      long getTimestamp()
      Get a timestamp indicating the time at which the pose reading was taken.
